function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of infectious diseases in built environments","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission, higher mortality rate, and overwhelmed health systems","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation, drainage systems, and building design, implementing strict sanitation measures, and promoting social distancing","Technologies":"Advanced HVAC systems, air purifiers, UV sterilization, and smart building management systems","People":"Residents, healthcare workers, visitors, and essential service providers","Owner":"Health authorities, building managers, architects, and urban planners"}]}
